column4: I am having trouble with printing...I have a ppd installed that has all the stapling, etc.  How do I do the n-up stuff.  I usually need to print 2-up or 4-up.  I am printing from firefox or openoffice.
can I just add n-up to a command line somewhere or change the .ppd to add nup/
you should be able to do these things via page setup menu
